description: Aggregate and normalize datasets from your cloud storage for faster discovery and analysis. Summarize rental prices to compare markets, spot trends, and share concise takeaways. Accelerate workflows by fetching core datasets and delivering clean, ready-to-use outputs.

capabilities.name: fetch_core_from_s3
capabilities.description: Read normalized core fields from S3 (bucket+key).

capabilities.name: fetch_and_normalize_from_s3
capabilities.description: Read and normalize rental listings from S3 (bucket+key).
